# billType

**Instance Property**

The type of the bill.

## Declaration

```swift
var billType: INBillType { get }
```

## Discussion

When performing the search, your results should contain bills whose type matches the value in this property. If the value in this property is [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INBillType/unknown], return all bills regardless of their type.

## Getting the Search Attributes

- **billPayee**: The recipient of the payment.
- **dueDateRange**: The range of due dates in which to search for bills.
- **paymentDateRange**: The range of payment dates in which to search for bills.
- **status**: The status of the bill.
